ch0249_40_rulina/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ], you’re here! I just
couldn’t wait to see you.
ch0249_40_rulina/0101_0701_02_10:
Would you mind spending this lovely day together
with me?
ch0249_40_rulina/7101_0701_01_10: What do you think about this red costume?
ch0249_40_rulina/7101_0701_02_10:
I feel like it has an elegant exterior that’s hiding
a passionate spirit within.
ch0249_40_rulina/7101_0701_03_10: I’d say it suits me perfectly. I love it!
ch0249_40_rulina/7102_0701_01_10: I often go out fishing with Eiscue.
ch0249_40_rulina/7102_0701_02_10:
The little rascal uses the hair at the top of his head
to fish!
ch0249_40_rulina/7102_0701_03_10:
I’d really love to show you someday. It’s quite a
sight to behold!
ch0249_40_rulina/7103_0701_01_10:
It’s so lovely to get together with you and with my
other friends. I always have such an exciting time!
ch0249_40_rulina/7103_0701_02_10:
There’s a feeling of warmth with friends that’s
different from when you’re with family.
ch0249_40_rulina/7103_0701_03_10:
You’ve just got to make sure you don’t get too
excited and overdo it!
ch0249_40_rulina/7104_0701_01_10:
As a model, I always have to think about the way
I carry myself.
ch0249_40_rulina/7104_0701_02_10:
When I stand up straight and tall, I think my
clothes look even better on me.
ch0249_40_rulina/7104_0701_03_10:
Give it a try! You’ll feel just like you’re strutting
down the runway.
ch0249_40_rulina/7105_0701_01_10:
Sonia and I are always going out together and
looking at the latest fashion and cosmetics.
ch0249_40_rulina/7105_0701_02_10:
Would you like to come with us next time,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0249_40_rulina/7105_0701_03_10: I’ll pick out the perfect clothes for you!
ch0249_40_rulina/1701_0701_01_10:
I found something that’s just perfect for you.
Here you go!
ch0249_40_rulina/1701_0702_01_10:
Go on, don’t be shy! I’d be very happy if I knew it
came in handy for you.
ch0249_40_rulina/2501_0701_01_10:
It’s important to always keep your cool. But that’s
easier said than done.
ch0249_40_rulina/2501_0701_02_10:
That’s why everyone’s got to think of their own
way to chill out.
ch0249_40_rulina/2501_0702_01_10:
Whenever things get heated during a battle, I pick
up Eiscue and give him a hug.
ch0249_40_rulina/2501_0702_02_10: He’s cool and soothing, and it feels very “noice.”
ch0249_40_rulina/2501_0702_03_10:
Why don’t you give him a hug, too? Try it once,
and you’ll be hooked!
ch0249_40_rulina/2511_0701_01_10:
Eiscue is originally from someplace that’s much
colder than here.
ch0249_40_rulina/2511_0701_02_10:
He drifted across the ocean for a long time before
he came to me.
ch0249_40_rulina/2511_0701_03_10:
From time to time, I get to thinking...where exactly
did he come from?
ch0249_40_rulina/2511_0702_01_10:
I’d really love to go looking for the place where
Eiscue was born and grew up.
ch0249_40_rulina/2511_0702_02_10:
Nothing wrong with going out on a spontaneous
little adventure like that, right?
ch0249_40_rulina/2511_0702_03_10:
If you came with me, I know we’d have an
amazing time!
ch0249_40_rulina/3001_0701_01_10:
I never skip my morning jog with my partner
Pokémon, even when it’s cold out. It’s a great
way to jolt myself awake!
ch0249_40_rulina/3003_0701_01_10:
The sunlight here on Pasio can be quite
intense, so I make sure to keep up with
my skin-care routine.
ch0249_40_rulina/3005_0701_01_10:
At night, the ocean can be quite frightening,
as if it could swallow you right up. But the moon
does shine so prettily on the water.
